scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/bratchun-project/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/bratchun-project
  set jcr:title{String} to "My project"
end
create service user bratchun-service-user with path /home/users/system/bratchun/service-users

set ACL for bratchun-service-user
allow jcr:all, rep:write on /content/bratchun-project
end
